name: user_follower_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_download_video.
Tool description: Tiktok Best Spider. Fast. HD Quality. Without Watermark Download. Video Full Detail. Signature X-Argus,X-Ladon,X-Gorgon 
mail: nb429429@gmail.com

API description: Fetches the follower list of a specified TikTok user.

user_id.description: The ID of the TikTok user whose followers are to be fetched.

time.description: The start time for fetching followers. Default is '0'.

count.description: The number of followers to fetch. Maximum is 200. Default is '50'.
